fields.description: This is a unique reference identifier to the set of asset pooling rules.
Used to define the order of the rules (ascending).
Reference to existing companies or company hierarchies to which the asset pooling rule applies.
Reference to existing spend categories or spend category hierarchies to which the asset pooling rule applies.
Reference to existing item to which the asset pooling rule applies.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
The quantity above which the asset pooling rule applies. Quantity must be greater than zero.
The amount below which the asset pooling rule applies.

Asset_Pooling_Rule_ID.description: This is a unique reference identifier to the set of asset pooling rules.

Asset_Pooling_Rule_Order.description: Used to define the order of the rules (ascending).

Company_Reference.description: Reference to existing companies or company hierarchies to which the asset pooling rule applies.

Currency_Reference_Currency_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Currency_Reference_Currency_Numeric_Code.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Currency_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Items_Reference.description: Reference to existing item to which the asset pooling rule applies.

Quantity_Greater_Than.description: The quantity above which the asset pooling rule applies. Quantity must be greater than zero.

Spend_Category_or_Hierarchy_Reference.description: Reference to existing spend categories or spend category hierarchies to which the asset pooling rule applies.

Unit_Cost_Threshold.description: The amount below which the asset pooling rule applies.
